#summary Third party dependencies.

= Third party dependencies =

== Not in Maven Central ==
  * *voldemort-1.3.0.jar* - used by gl-service [http://www.project-voldemort.com/voldemort/ Voldemort]

== Listing dependencies ==
You can view a project's dependencies using the [http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-dependency-plugin/ Maven Dependency Plugin].
{{{
$ mvn dependency:tree
}}}

== Repository Management ==
Companies should have there own local repository, but individuals may add missing jars locally.  See
http://maven.apache.org/repository-management.html

= Workaround for installing missing dependencies =
Change to the *dependency-pull* directory and execute the following to install the missing jars in your local maven repository. 
{{{
2% mvn package
}}}
The [https://code.google.com/p/genotype-list/source/browse/trunk/dependency-pull/pom.xml pom.xml] is configured to download the proper files and install them.

= Manually adding missing dependencies to local repository =

<br/>
Download voldemort-1.3.0 from

http://code.google.com/p/project-voldemort/downloads/detail?name=voldemort-1.3.0.tar.gz&can=2&q=


<br/>
Extract voldemort-1.3.0.jar and install to the local repository with

{{{
$ tar xvfz voldemort-1.3.0.tar.gz
$ mvn install:install-file \
      -DgroupId=org.immunogenomics.gl.voldemort \
      -DartifactId=voldemort \
      -Dversion=1.3.0 \
      -Dpackaging=jar \
      -Dfile=voldemort-1.3.0/dist/voldemort-1.3.0.jar
